titleStmt.title: An elegy on the much lamented Sir William Waller, who valiantly hang'd himself at Rotterdam.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N.T. at the entrance into the Old-Spring-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Rise, grim Alecto, rise ('tis fit to chuse ..."
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
